briefdescription.para: Initializes for shop scene, any booleans/strings/floats and meshes.
Updates the scene every frame (Animation/booleans/music etc)
The main render function for this scene, renders any text/meshes.
Renders the skybox on screen with rotation, scaling done.

memberdef.argsstring: (Mesh *mesh, std::string text, Color color, float size, float x, float y)
memberdef.name: RenderTextOnScreen

briefdescription.para: Renders text on screen in the game.

memberdef.argsstring: (Mesh *mesh, float size, float x, float y, float rotate, float rx, float ry, float rz, float z)
memberdef.name: RenderQuadOnScreen

briefdescription.para: Renders any meshList items/obj on the screen.
Pushes in the shop scene into array from text file, allows easy changes.
Checks for if player is in each other the "shop/buying/selling" scene and show out the options player can use.
Renders the shop scene with needed meshes and takes care of shop interactables.
